SFQ1.Description: Have you ever been the victim of a scam or financial exploitation?

SFQ2.Description: If yes, Approximately how much money (in dollars) did you lose as a result of fraud or financial exploitation in your lifetime?

SFQ3.Description: If yes, Approximately when did the scam or financial exploitation occur?

SFQ4.Description: How would you categorize the scam or financial exploitation that occur?

Levels.1: An impersonator (fake government, business, love interest, grandchild, etc)
Levels.2: Job, investment, or money making opportunity

SFQ5.Description: Can you describe the event and what happened?

SFQ6.Description: How much money have you lost in your lifetime as a result of fraud, financial exploitation, or related scams?

SFQ7.Description: How much money have you lost in the past 12 months as a result of fraud, financial exploitation, or related scams?
